name: Headlines
body:
Welcome to Headlines documentation
---
## POST a headline:

    /headline

Sample body

```
{
    "article": null,
    "userId": "546a9404e3650bc830d62466",
    "headline": "RHCP are the bomb",
    "dateCreated": 9765467,
    "voteCount": 0,
    "threshold": 5
}
```

## GET the 20 latest headlines

    /headlines/date/:number

Examples

```
/headlines/date/0
```
will get the latest 20 headlines

```
/headlines/date/10
```
will get the 10th - 30th latest headlines

Example Response

```
[
   {
       "_id": "54b0d293036afeca6a640965",
       "article": null,
       "userId": "546a9404e3650bc830d62466",
       "headline": "How is this happening without being authenticated",
       "dateCreated": 1420874387,
       "voteCount": 6,
       "threshold": 5,
       "__v": 0
   },
   ...
]
```

## GET the 20 most popular headlines

    /headlines/date/:number

Examples

```
/headlines/date/0
```
will get the most popular 20 headlines

```
/headlines/date/10
```
will get the 10th - 30th most popular headlines

Example Response

```
[
   {
       "_id": "54b0d293036afeca6a640965",
       "article": null,
       "userId": "546a9404e3650bc830d62466",
       "headline": "How is this happening without being authenticated",
       "dateCreated": 1420874387,
       "voteCount": 6,
       "threshold": 5,
       "__v": 0
   },
   ...
]
```

## Upvote a Headline

    /headlines/upvote/:headlineId/:userId

## Get UserInfo

    /userInfo

Example respone:

```
{
    "_id" : ObjectId("54b0867f5391f5e12b992800"),
    "twitter" : "1898936881",
    "email" : "benjamincarrol@twitter.com",
    "votes" : [54b0caef9d916147621bf4fb],
    "profile" : { "picture" : "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/531636981113974784/4ogD0f4B_normal.jpeg",
    "website" : "",
    "location" : "",
    "gender" : "",
    "name" : "Benjamin Carroll" },
    "tokens" : [ { "tokenSecret" : "ksunRRgaiOZb9F3CRJIxOuUjK9WOB9iXBl9WjdBmRmO5P", "accessToken" : "1898936881-mjczNXxQ4oohch4rmDBo3zaoprjyRn8fO8lKIjZ", "kind" : "twitter" } ], "__v" : 0

}
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
